post.body: Mac went to the doctor today. He is now 11 lbs 1 oz. He had lost some weight that he had to make up. Good job Mac!
At el ranchito with matt, marc, mac, grammy, 3 germans, and a dennis. Good times!
Had baby Thursday. In 007 today. I am truly a McGill!
Been alseep. But just got woken to take meds. Now going to sleep again!
Mac has had lots of visitors today! He was quiet and looked handsome for all of them!
Hi all I just had a baby. Mac arrived at 910. He is 10lbs 15oz. 20 and a half inches long. He is soooo cute. Thanks for the prayers
Miller woke up at 3am which is very unusual. I went in. He had flipped himself over. So awesome and crazy. He now will nap in his be ...
In the car with Marc. He heard a loud base from a car radio. He asked if we were by a church. Thank you Saddleback!
Soren is coming in 4 days. Words can't express how excited my family is.
Going to have a reunion with Millers birth family while in the hospital having Mac. Talk about multi tasking!!
Anyone want to pick Marc up from school? I dont want to move anymore!!! Just kidding. Sort of!!! 7 more days until baby Mac.
At the dentist with max and marc.
Loved the rain this morning. Pretending it is still raining and feeding my kids in the car. Really.I just don't want to move more than ...
Courtney gause is in the house of fuse. Welcome!
Had maxs conference. Academically doing awesome. Nice to hear but loved that he is respectful and kind. Good job max!
Just saw the greatest dog--a bulldog! So cute! I hate dogs still so matt don't get your hopes up. This dog just made me think of my dad.
Picked up marc from school. He got a new library book and he is so excited. Oh to be 5! Max gets home early today. He should be happy ...
I love that my mom is on twitter. Seriously everyone needs to follow bfnight.
Switched miller to 4 hour feedings. Matt forgot to feed him at 3 so he went 4 and 40 min. Poor miller!
I have to give a twitter shout out to my newest follower--my mom. Happy twitting! She is bfnight if anyone wants her awesome wisdom!
I love Suetafalla
Just was at the staff wives xmas party. So fun.
First day I was on my own with the three babies officially! All went great!
McMovie night has me waiting for Matts movie to end. 4 xmases was funny. It will not win any awards except the hot dude award for Vince!
They are on the cookie isle
For all of you on twitter angelawilliams makes the best soup!
Angelawilliams if that is to me you are sooooo right!!!!
Mac has thrush. Gross! Took the 3 babies to the doctor to find out then to target to pick up the perscription!
Max bought ice cream at school lunch. He was so excited he wanted to show me. Backpack + ice cream= not good!
Courtneygause I can't wait until I get you out on the ski slopes without a turtleneck.. A little drafty!
Anyone know where my husband is?
Courtney, 2 babysitters, Grammy, Grandpa Charlie. Ahhh now Matt and I can leave our kids for some alone time!!!
No bag until friday. Boo! I got to go buy clothes at the grocery store today. Every newport beach girls dream!
Being driven by some awesome idaho folk!
I love that movie courtneygause!
I am in a shuttle with the two babies. Matt is figuring out missing bag situation with the other kids. Pray for him!
Watching Boiler Room. Awesome!
Only rich people shop at banana republic and the gap!
